title: Jurors ask pointed questions in MEV bot trial as deliberations proceed
summary: As deliberations entered their second day in a criminal trial over a $25 million exploit, jurors asked for clarification on previous testimony and the definition of “good faith.”

title: $100B in old Bitcoin moved, raising ‘OG’ versus ‘trader’ debate
summary: Over $100 billion in old Bitcoin has moved as spot ETFs see record outflows, igniting debate over whether true OGs or traders are driving the market sell-off.

title: The truth behind Zcash comeback in 2025
summary: Privacy-focused protocol Zcash has received newfound support from industry experts and influencers, sending its native token price to multiyear highs this year.

title: Bitcoin ‘$68K too low’ versus gold says JPMorgan as BTC, stocks dip again
summary: JPMorgan said that the latest BTC price drawdown meant that Bitcoin was now undervalued compared to gold, in contrast to the end of 2024.

title: How perp DEXs quietly took over 26% of the futures market
summary: Perpetual DEXs are reshaping decentralized trading with faster execution, deeper liquidity and crosschain integration.

title: Bitcoin’s valuation metric hints at a ‘possible bottom’ forming: Analysis
summary: Bitcoin’s MVRV ratio indicated that BTC was forming a potential local bottom, suggesting that the price can recover due to seller exhaustion.

title: Bitcoin is finding grassroots strongholds across the US
summary: Across the United States, Bitcoin is gaining traction far from coastal tech hubs, driven by cultural alignment, local educators and emerging state-level legislation.

title: RedStone unveils DeFi risk ratings weeks after $20B crypto market wipeout
summary: RedStone expands beyond price oracles with Credora, integrating risk analytics across DeFi protocols Morpho and Spark.

title: Bitcoin.com, Concordium partner on age-verified crypto payments
summary: Bitcoin.com and Concordium have teamed up to introduce age-verified stablecoin payments to 75 million wallets, blending privacy with new compliance standards.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.
